attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop this notion that there is a British population explosion and we need to built on the Nations precious Green Belts, we all know that the increase in births is almost entirely due to the Governments blatantly uncontrolled immigration policy that lets all types of people in to our country from nations to whom we have on allegiance or duty (unlike the Gurkha who has every right to settle here) If we are to be forced without a vote into the EU then at least  adopt there immigration policy, there are not hoards of people storming the doors of Germany or France. Listen to the people just for once
